downloadTitle: Phlat (Prototype for Helpful Lookup and Tagging)
downloadDescription: Phlat is a new interface for Windows Desktop Search, enabling search through a user's own e-mail, files, and viewed Web pages. Last published: April 19, 2006.
detailsSection: Phlat is a new interface for Windows Desktop Search, enabling search through a user's own e-mail, files, and viewed Web pages. Phlat makes it easy for users to specify queries and filters, attempting to integrate search and browsing in one intuitive interface. In addition, Phlat supports a unified tagging scheme for organizing personal content across storage systems, such as files and e-mail.
